ygData.subject: RE: Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can this be used to make clurg like you enough to do the stein quest? ... From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@edulog.com] Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 3:48
ygData.messageBody:
Can this be used to make clurg like you enough to do the stein quest?

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 3:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion
(sp)
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

Uses for combat? I don't think it will work. It would be similar to going
invis while in the middle of combat, and that sure as heck don't work. This
song has great longterm benefits in the fact that you'll get better prices
from NPC vendors when buying and selling. It also allows you to start /
finish quests that would normally require a lot grunt work to get to the
appropriate faction.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen [mailto:SLANGE@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:09 PM
To: Eqbards (E-mail)
Subject: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)


From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>


Played with my new Level 11 spell today. Its a nice faction modifier, have
seen mysefl go from inddiferent to amiable and from apprehensive to
indifferent. Aside from using it to move past the occasional hostile mob, I
was wondering if it had any use in actul combat? Thanks for any insight.
